meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Beth Ford Roth Connie Loren Christopher Short Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6123.

td.p: Beth Ford Roth, a freelance writer from Carlsbad, California
Connie Loren, a speech language pathologist from Wichita, Kansas
Christopher Short, a pub trivia editor from Crawfordsville, Indiana (whose 3-day cash winnings total $38,399)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '[The end-of-round signal sounds.]

1876

Christopher
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Alfred Johnson sailed alone in his aptly named dory "Centennial" from Massachusetts to Britain in this year')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Alfred Johnson sailed alone in his aptly named dory "Centennial" from Massachusetts to Britain in this year

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'This aviator first flew into the world near Millville on April 16, 1867; Orville landed in Ohio in 1871')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This aviator first flew into the world near Millville on April 16, 1867; Orville landed in Ohio in 1871

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Hannah Storm reads the clue from the set of SportsCenter.) This tennis champ is facing her 2010 breast cancer diagnosis with the same spirit that won her 18 Grand Slam singles titles & the U.S. Open mixed doubles at the age of 49')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Hannah Storm reads the clue from the set of SportsCenter.) This tennis champ is facing her 2010 breast cancer diagnosis with the same spirit that won her 18 Grand Slam singles titles & the U.S. Open mixed doubles at the age of 49

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_5', 'clue_J_6_5_stuck', '(Alex: [*]! Well done! $1,000 more for you, and and our thanks to Hannah Storm for delivering those clues so well. That scares me.)

(Janet) Guthrie

Christopher
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_6_5', 'clue_J_6_5_stuck', '(Hannah Storm reads the clue from the set of SportsCenter.) In 1977 this ex-aerospace engineer became the first woman to earn starting spots in both the Indy 500 & the Daytona 500')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Hannah Storm reads the clue from the set of SportsCenter.) In 1977 this ex-aerospace engineer became the first woman to earn starting spots in both the Indy 500 & the Daytona 500

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 13):
Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: (Alex: Each correct response will beging with a "P" and be followed at some point with an "F" and a "T".)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
BethWho was Mendelsonn?
$9,598
ConnieWho is Mussorgsky?
$6,000
ChristopherWho is Mendelssohn?
$9,200
Felix Mendelssohn')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'His first name means "happy", but 3 of his 5 symphonies are in gloomy minor keys')

tr.td: His first name means "happy", but 3 of his 5 symphonies are in gloomy minor keys
